description:
Computes the arithmetic mean (average) of a datacube `x` (*`avg(x)`*).

The operand must be a datacube.


The result is a scalar number. Operand elements which are null are ignored while computing the result.

The element type of the result depends on the element type of the operand:

```
| operand type     | result type   |
|------------------|---------------|
| any complex type | CFloat64      |
| X                | double        |
```

returns.description: The computed arithmetic mean (average) of `x`; null elements are ignored.
